channel.title: Definitions on Trading notes
channel.description: Recent content in Definitions on Trading notes

item.title: Terminology
item.description: Stock A stock is a piece of ownership in a company. For instance, if you buy a stock in Walmart, you own a part of the retail store. Day traders buy company stocks with the aim of making profit at the end of the trading day. Stockbroker A stockbroker is a regulated professional who is responsible for buying and selling stocks, as well as other securities for stock traders through a stock exchange.

item.title: Definitions
item.description: Rally + Correction Rally Short upward movement in a bear market Correction Short downward movement in a bull market
